BundleProduct.description: Defines groups of products bundled together, such as a mobile phone package that includes the phone, charger, and call plan

bundleType.description: Type of product bundle, such as Sold as One Unit or Configurable

areBundledProductsDecidedAtUse.description: True if the content of a bundle is only decided (dynamically) at the point of bundle use, false otherwise

areBundledProductsSoldTogether.description: True if all bundled products are sold together, false if some can be excluded

canBundledProductsBeSubstituted.description: True if products in a bundle can be substituted for other products, false otherwise

doBundledProductsDecideAvailability.description: True if bundle availability is based on availability of the bundled products, false if the bundle is inventoried on its own

quantityCount.description: Total number of items in the bundle package

quantityUnitOfMeasure.description: Unit of measure for stating the bundle quantity

tareWeight.description: Total weight of the product bundle without the product content

weightUnitOfMeasure.description: Unit of measure for stating the weight of the bundle

expectedWasteCount.description: How many products in the bundle are expected to be wasted

id.description: Unique identifier for the entity, can be null on create if auto-generated

longDescription.description: Longer general description of the product

productInstance.description: Discriminator property identifying the specific product instance type, such as ServiceProduct

productStatus.description: Status of the product, such as Active or Inactive

primaryProductCategoryId.description: References the primary product category of the product

primarySalesChannelId.description: Primary sales channel used to sell the product

definingProductId.description: Reference to a product that is not sold but defines what is to be sold

businessUnitId.description: References the logical internal organization to which the product belongs

glAccountCode.description: Identifies how instances of the product are accounted for

brand.description: Brand information for the product, including grade

id.description: Unique identifier for the entity, can be null on create if auto-generated

brandGrade.description: Identifies the value of the brand, such as Premium or Value

parentBrandId.description: References the larger brand that contains the brand

internalOrganizationId.description: References an internal organization or department within the company

createdDate.description: Timestamp of when the entity was created

createdBy.description: Identifies the system or user which created the entity

updatedDate.description: Timestamp of when the entity was last updated

updatedBy.description: Identifies the system or user which last updated the entity

isDeleted.description: Indicates whether or not the entity has been soft-deleted

productSku.description: Unique stock keeping unit number for the product

productUpc.description: Represents the unique 12-digit code assigned to each individual product, which is universal across systems

manufacturerName.description: Name of the manufacturer for the product

manufacturerPartNumber.description: Unique number assigned by the manufacturer to identify the product

modelNumber.description: Manufacturer identifier of the product model

modelYear.description: Marketed model year for the product

versionName.description: Name of the version associated with the product model

lotIdentifier.description: Identifier of the lot group assigned by the manufacturer

packagedInCountryCode.description: Country code where the product was packaged

producedInCountryCode.description: Country code where the product was produced

availabilityDate.description: Date when the product is made available for sale

discontinuedDate.description: Date when the product has been discontinued and is no longer for sale

validFromDate.description: Date from which the product can actually be used

validToDate.description: Date to which the product can actually be used

validForPeriodUnitOfMeasure.description: Unit of measure for validity period, such as Hours, Days, Months

canUseQuantitySchedule.description: True if the product can have a quantity schedule, false otherwise

quantityScheduleType.description: Type of quantity schedule (if the product has one), such as Divide or Repeat

quantityInstallmentCount.description: Number of installments for the quantity schedule

quantityInstallmentPeriod.description: Amount of time covered by the quantity schedule

canUseRevenueSchedule.description: True if the product can have a revenue schedule, false otherwise

revenueScheduleType.description: Type of revenue schedule (if the product has one), such as Divide or Repeat

revenueInstallmentCount.description: Number of installments for the revenue schedule

revenueInstallmentPeriod.description: Amount of time covered by the revenue schedule

priceChargeType.description: Identifies whether the product is to be sold based on weights, units, or usage

requiresInvididualUnitPricing.description: True if product items require individual prices, false otherwise

suggestedRetailPrice.description: Default price for the product (Manufacturer Suggested Retail Price)

requiredDepositAmount.description: Amount that must be paid as deposit to be able to pickup or use the product

requiredDepositPercentage.description: Percentage that must be paid up front as deposit to be able to pickup or use the product

minimumAdvertisementAmount.description: Lowest price for the product allowed (normally by the manufacturer) to be used in an advertisement

minimumAdvertisementAmountStartDate.description: Earliest date the lowest price can be stated in an advertisement

stockLedgerValuationAmount.description: Total value of product goods as held in stock

standardWarrantyLengthMonth.description: Indicates the length of warranty included by the seller (not the manufacturer)

rewardProgramPointsCount.description: Indicates how many reward points are awarded for purchasing the item

disposalType.description: Identifies how the product is to be disposed of, such as Recycled or Returned

allowCustomerReturn.description: True if the customer can return the product, false otherwise

allowPartialRefund.description: True if the customer can get a partial refund when the product is returned, false otherwise

isAutoProvisionable.description: True if the product can be automatically provisioned, false otherwise

isBackOrdered.description: True if the product is not in stock and has been backordered, false otherwise

isCertified.description: True if the product represents a part that is certified, false otherwise

isCompetitiveProduct.description: True if the product is similar to, or directly competes with, another product in the marketplace, false otherwise

isCouponRedemptionAllowed.description: True if a coupon can be redeemed for the product, false otherwise

isCustomerDiscountAllowed.description: True if customers can be offered the product at a discounted price, false otherwise

isDynamicBundle.description: True if actual content of the product bundle can be derived at point of use, false otherwise

isEpaCompliant.description: True if the product is compliant with environment protection regulations, false otherwise

isFoodstampPaymentAllowed.description: True if foodstamps can be redeemed for the product, false otherwise

isInstallable.description: True if the product can be installed, false otherwise

isIntellectualPropertyProtected.description: True if knowledge about the product can be considered sensitive intellectual property, false otherwise

isManualPriceEntryRequired.description: True if price must be manually entered for the product, false otherwise

isMultipleCouponsAllowed.description: True if multiple coupons can be redeemed for the product, false otherwise

isPartnerDiscountAllowed.description: True if seller and supplier partners get a discount on the product, false otherwise

isPreOrderable.description: True if the product is not yet for sale but can be pre-ordered, false otherwise

isQualityVerificationRequired.description: True if a visual inspection of the product must be done, false otherwise

isQuantityEntryRequired.description: True if a quantity must be entered for the product at checkout, false otherwise

isRainCheckAllowed.description: True if product not in stock can be promised at the same price on a later date, false otherwise

isReturnable.description: True if the product can be returned, false otherwise

isSellable.description: True if the product is intended to be sold, false otherwise

isSellableIndependently.description: True if the product can be sold by itself (not in a bundle), false otherwise

isSellableWithoutPrice.description: True if the product can be sold without a price, false otherwise

isSerialized.description: True if each instance of the product has a unique serial number, false otherwise

isWeightEntryRequired.description: True if weight must be entered for the product, false otherwise

isWorkerDiscountAllowed.description: True if employees and contractors get a discount on the product, false otherwise

productAttributes.description: A set of attributes associated with the product, which can be a list of identifier references or complete objects (not both)

anyOf.description: A specific attribute of a product definition, such as shoe lace length

id.description: Unique identifier for the entity, can be null on create if auto-generated

productAttributeValues.description: List of possible values associated with the product attribute, which can be a list of identifier references or complete objects (not both)

anyOf.description: A predefined value for a product attribute, such as a specific shoe lace length

id.description: Unique identifier for the entity, can be null on create if auto-generated

name.description: Name of the product attribute value

attributeValue.description: Actual value of the product attribute

customAttributeValue.description: If the value is not from a predefined list, a manual value can be provided here

defaultImageId.description: References the first product image for the variation

createdDate.description: Timestamp of when the entity was created

createdBy.description: Identifies the system or user which created the entity

updatedDate.description: Timestamp of when the entity was last updated

updatedBy.description: Identifies the system or user which last updated the entity

isDeleted.description: Indicates whether or not the entity has been soft-deleted

createdDate.description: Timestamp of when the entity was created

createdBy.description: Identifies the system or user which created the entity

updatedDate.description: Timestamp of when the entity was last updated

updatedBy.description: Identifies the system or user which last updated the entity

isDeleted.description: Indicates whether or not the entity has been soft-deleted

productImages.description: A set of images associated with the product, which can be a list of identifier references or complete objects (not both)

anyOf.description: Represents an image associated with a product

id.description: Unique identifier for the entity, can be null on create if auto-generated

imageId.description: Reference to the actual image definition

imageViewType.description: Classification of the image view, such as Large or Small icon

isDefaultImage.description: True if the image is the default one for the product, false otherwise

createdDate.description: Timestamp of when the entity was created

createdBy.description: Identifies the system or user which created the entity

updatedDate.description: Timestamp of when the entity was last updated

updatedBy.description: Identifies the system or user which last updated the entity

isDeleted.description: Indicates whether or not the entity has been soft-deleted

productCollateral.description: Additional collateral associated with the product, which can be a list of identifier references or complete objects (not both)

anyOf.description: Collatoral information about a product, such as a link to a brochure

id.description: Unique identifier for the entity, can be null on create if auto-generated

productCollateralUrl.description: Specifies the online location of the collateral

createdDate.description: Timestamp of when the entity was created

createdBy.description: Identifies the system or user which created the entity

updatedDate.description: Timestamp of when the entity was last updated

updatedBy.description: Identifies the system or user which last updated the entity

isDeleted.description: Indicates whether or not the entity has been soft-deleted

relatedProducts.description: Other products related to the product, which can be a list of identifier references or complete objects (not both)

anyOf.description: A grouping of products such as a product bundle

id.description: Unique identifier for the entity, can be null on create if auto-generated

anyOf.description: Defines the types of relationships available, such as bundled with or substituted for

id.description: Unique identifier for the entity, can be null on create if auto-generated

name.description: Name of the product relationship type

parentProductRole.description: What is the first role in the relationship, such as Consists of

childProductRole.description: What is the second role in the relationship, such as Component of

createdDate.description: Timestamp of when the entity was created

createdBy.description: Identifies the system or user which created the entity

updatedDate.description: Timestamp of when the entity was last updated

updatedBy.description: Identifies the system or user which last updated the entity

isDeleted.description: Indicates whether or not the entity has been soft-deleted

productRelationshipType.description: Descripts the type of relationship between the products

parentProductId.description: Reference to product 1 that is related to product 2

childProductId.description: Reference to product 2 that is related to product 1

activeFromDate.description: Date from when the product relationship is active

activeToDate.description: Date to when the product relationship is active

isDefaultOption.description: True if this is the default option for a product, such as a phone case being a default option for a phone

createdDate.description: Timestamp of when the entity was created

createdBy.description: Identifies the system or user which created the entity

updatedDate.description: Timestamp of when the entity was last updated

updatedBy.description: Identifies the system or user which last updated the entity

isDeleted.description: Indicates whether or not the entity has been soft-deleted

externalIds.description: External identifiers associated with the entity

anyOf.description: Defines a structure for referencing an entity in external systems

id.description: Unique identifier for the entity, can be null on create if auto-generated

externalId.description: A unique identifier assigned to an entity in another system

externalIdType.description: Identifies the system that owns or otherwise recognizes this unique identifier

status.description: Indicates whether this identifier is currently valid or not

statusLastChangedDate.description: Date and time of the last change in status

createdDate.description: Timestamp of when the entity was created

createdBy.description: Identifies the system or user which created the entity

updatedDate.description: Timestamp of when the entity was last updated

updatedBy.description: Identifies the system or user which last updated the entity

isDeleted.description: Indicates whether or not the entity has been soft-deleted
